Uses of Package
org.monome.pages

Classes in org.monome.pages used by org.monome.pages
AbletonClipLauncherPage
          The Ableton Clip Launcher page.
AbletonClipUpdater
          The AbletonClipUpdater runs as a thread and constantly queries Ableton for the state of it's clips and tracks.
AbletonOSCSettingsFrame
          The AbletonOSCSettingsFrame class creates a window for accepting Ableton OSC configuration parameters and updates the Configuration object as needed.
Configuration
          This object stores all configuration about all current monomes and pages.
MachineDrum
          A utility class to interact with the Elektron MachineDrum over a MIDI connection.
MonomeConfiguration
           
NewMonomeFrame
          This class generates a configuration window for a new monome configuration.
OSCSettingsFrame
          The MonomeSerial OSC settings window.
Page
          The Page interface.
